column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We spent some time in their whisky room
column3: I for the life of me can not remember his name
column4: he was I guess the whiskey connoisseur
column5: had a long chat with my husband and dad about the world wide and major whisky collection he had travelled to select for Bosscat (we are Scottish so you can imagine my dads delight at this.) we then took a seat at the front of the restaurant to spend the rest Of the evening tasting whisky and drinking almost until close! Service never faulted once! All in all it was a fantastic evening especially for a
